channel.title: [HTML Forum Webclient] Need help
channel.description:
Hi, Moparscape! I was searching through some Rsps's and I came across a server that had their webclient on their forums.
[img]http://i876.photobucket.com/albums/ab330/jason_gbg/webclient.jpg[/img]
[b] As you can see, I have the HTML Loader working, but the actual problem im having is finding a way to put the actual client on there... I have never done something like this so I don't know if there's a way to add like a <link> or something to make it load the actual client.jar but im totally lost on this, I can make a whole different page and upload a html and the .jar to my FTP, but I wanted to make my webclient directly on the forums. If anyone could help it'd be much appreciated. I have seen this done before, so I know that it is possible! :confused:[/b]

item.title: [HTML Forum Webclient] Need help
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

[quote=“startcode, post:2, topic:457379”]if you have a html file on your forums, paste the code for webclient in there and where it says:

put the dropbox link of your .jar file between the “”[/quote]

It worked, thank you so much! Much appreciated man! (:

Read full topic

As you can see, I have the HTML Loader working, but the actual problem im having is finding a way to put the actual client on there… I have never done something like this so I don’t know if there’s a way to add like a or something to make it load the actual client.jar but im totally lost on this, I can make a whole different page and upload a html and the .jar to my FTP, but I wanted to make my webclient directly on the forums.
